str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From timios; to prize, i.e. Fix a valuation upon; by implication, to revere.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
A mother. Apparently a primary word; a 'mother'.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To speak evil of, curse, revile, abuse. From a compound of kakos and logos; to revile.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
A mother. Apparently a primary word; a 'mother'.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To end, finish, die, complete. From a presumed derivative of teleo; to finish life, i.e. Expire.
